Package org.fluidity.testing

Utilities to simplify unit testing with EasyMock.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Simulator.Composite<T>
    Composite mock object.
    Simulator.MockObjects
    Creates mock objects.
    Simulator.Task
    Encapsulates a sequence of code to execute as part of some test case.
    Simulator.Task.Concurrent
    A factory of concurrent tasks, to be used with Simulator.Threads.concurrent(Simulator.Task.Concurrent).
    Simulator.Threads
    Allows test cases to manage interacting threads.
    Simulator.Work<T>
    Encapsulates a sequence of code, to execute as part of some test case, that returns some value.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Simulator
    Facilitates the use of multiple EasyMock control objects.

Package org.fluidity.testing Description

Utilities to simplify unit testing with EasyMock.
